name: Spunkiver
description:
Spunkiver: Navigate through a maze-like dungeon avoiding enemies and collecting items

Made in less than 48 hours for GB30 Jam [8 Bits to Infinity]  for which the theme was It's dangerous to go alone... and Kenney Jam 2019 for which the theme was Unlikely combinations. Made in Unity 2019.2.0f1.

Game created by lilou_cormic (purplecable.ca)

Contains music and sounds ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Contains assets (graphics and font) by Kenney (www.kenney.nl)

Source code available on GitHub.
